Text: Goodbye and Good LuckAll I have had a wonderful time working with each of you over the course of the last year on various projects here at EBS But it is time that I move on to the next phase of my business and personal life Today is my last day here in the office I wish all of you the best of luck in your endeavors I would love to keep in touch and hope that you feel the same My email address is As most of you know my next career opportunity is most likely going to involve a relocation to the San Francisco area I should know definitively by next Friday July th Ill forward additional contact information for out there once I am settled Hope to hear from you in the future Mark Solana Office Cell
